amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to eliminate tax loopholes and special interest tax breaks for the PGA tour, the NFL, NASCAR, Hollywood, fish tackle box manufacturers, and Eskimo whaling captains.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 414 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 414 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 414 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.
